title: E329 Easter Oyster
itunes:title: Easter Oyster
description:
Theo discusses his views on St. Patrick's Day, the Bill Burr controversy at the Grammy's, Panda Express hazing it's new employees and buying a new house in Nashville. Plus, Theo gives a single mom with Stage 4 cancer a big surprise.

https://bit.ly/theo-von

New Merch: theovonstore.com​

 

Submit your funny videos, TikToks, questions and topics you'd like to hear on the podcast to tpwproducer@gmail.com.

Grubhub: https://www.grubhub.com Get the food you love with Perks from Grubhub

Liquid Death: https://liquiddeath.com
